"Weird how I invented the stuff, and don't take so serious." 
=C2=A0
(Just =
a friendly reminder)

-J

--- On Thu, 1/13=

From: Frank Sumpti=
on <purplealiengirl@...>

ryone knows better. [2 Attachments]
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoo=
groups.com
Date: Thursday, January 13, 2011, 11:05 AM


=C2=A0 


[Attachme=
nt(s) from Frank Sumption included below] 

=C2=A0I get this stuff over and=
 over and over and over and over... and I can see no reason why the new age=
 gurus proclaiming 2012 will be a great and hppy transformation are any mor=
e correct, or valid. They spout only an opinion, an opinioin of denial of a=
ll facts, and none of the ancient prophecies from around the world say "and=
 they all lived happily ever after". I would prefer to cross over conciousl=
y, not with my head up my butt hoping the outside world is really a paradis=
e. No one wants to face the possiblity, just like the commercial, maybe we =
should chug on over to mambe pambe land and get you some backbone! We all k=
now life is forever through EVP and spirit communication, so in a way it's =
a transformation to higher conciousness, but I think ya have to be=C2=A0awa=
re. Everyone runing around trying to figure out what the ancients were tryi=
ng to "tell us"--dah, a simple message, wake the f---- up! 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Th=
ey keep telling me I have to leave--what? Just jump off!? WFT is that?
=C2=
=A0
Anyway, I would not say it is 100%, and when 2013 comes, I will burn ev=
ery frikkin' box I have and move on to something else. 
=C2=A0
F-S
